metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2610 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Integer Overflow or Wraparound in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to9.0.1532.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2610` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.8
vim-athena - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.8
vim-common - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.8
vim-gtk - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.8
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.8
vim-gui-common - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.8
vim-nox - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.8
vim-runtime - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.8
vim-tiny - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.8
xxd - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.8').
